addBackToTopButtonOnEachPage.message: Add "Back to top" button on each page

addBackToTopButtonOnEachPage_tip.message: Add "Back to top" button. One-click to go back to the top of webspages.

addBatchOperationButton_tip.message: Add batch button to the top right of the posting list. Click button to enter batch operation mode. Select postings using click and shift. Batch shortlist / not interested / open in new tab selected postings.

addButtonsToAdjustDetailPageFontSize.message: Add buttons to adjust detail page font size

addButtonsToAdjustDetailPageFontSize_tip.message: Add two buttons at the top of posting information. Click the buttons to increase / decrease the font size

addExportAppliedToButton_tip.message: Add a button at the top of the Applied To list. Export the postings to excel on one-click.

addExportShortlistButton_tip.message: Add a button at the top of the shortlisted table. Export the postings to excel on one-click.

addPostingTitlesToRightSide.message: Add posting titles to the right side of the page

addPostingTitlesToRightSide_tip.message: Add a panel containing job title, company, and other information to the right side of the page.

appDesc.message: Azure offers multiple themes for WaterlooWorks and adds advanced features to the platform.

appointmentNavPageLayout_tip.message: Optimize the appointment navigation page layout to a modern tile design

autoCollapseMultiSelectBox.message: Auto collapse multiple selection box in search filter area

autoCollapseMultiSelectBox_tip.message: Auto collapse multiple selection box on search postings page. Turn off this switch to use default style.

autoEnterOnlyBookingOption.message: Auto enter the only booking option

autoEnterOnlyBookingOption_tip.message: If there is only one options available under the "booking options" box, then automatically select that options.

betterMsgColumn_tip.message: Reorder columns, auto hide unnecessary columns, bold new messages, click row to open message.

chooseColumnsToBeDisplayed.message: Basic Table <small>(Choose columns to be displayed)</small>

collapseAPptTypeIntro_tip.message: Collapse all the introductions on booking type selection page. Click the collapsed content to expand.

collapseTermsOfConsultation.message: Collapse / expand button for "terms of consultation"

collapseTermsOfConsultation_tip.message: Add a button to the bottom of "terms of consultation" box to collapse or expand the content. The default state is collapsed.

disclaimers_intro.message:
▷ This extension has no affiliation with WaterlooWorks, its developers, or the University of Waterloo.

▷ Use this extension at your own responsibility.

displayHideShowNewTabButton_tip.message: Add an extra button above the postings table. Click to hide / show the NEW tag before each job title.

displayHideShowShortlistedButton_tip.message: Add an extra button above the postings table. Click to hide / show shortlisted jobs in the table.

enableContextMenu_tip.message: Click anywhere on a row in the postings list to display the context menu. It contains several useful quick operations. This is helpful especially on large screen.

enableJobIntroPreview_tip.message: Click anywhere on a row to preview job in pop-up in current tab without reloading page.

enableKeywordsHighlight_tip.message: This feature highlights specific keywords when you are on the posting details page. You can turn on / off it using the switch here.

enableMyMessagesListOptimization_tip.message: This option controls all items in My Messages section. It can enable / disable all the other options in My Messages.

enablePaginationFloating_tip.message: If pagination exists, it will float at the bottom of the page to quick navigate between pages.

enablePostingListOptimization_tip.message: This option controls all items in Postings List section. It can enable / disable all the other options in Postings List.

enablePostingModal_tip.message:
Enable this option will allow you to preview posting information in a popup modal. To view in modal, there are 3 ways:

1. Click the globe icon to the right of the job title

2. Right click on the corresponding row and select "Preview In Modal"

3. Double click anywhere on the row

enableWaterlooWorksAzure_tip.message: This option is the total controller. It can enable / disable all the other options in the extension. The switch in the popup is synchronized with this one.

exportFailed.message: Export failed, please report this issue to the developer.

exportSuccess.message: Options text generated successfully. Content copied to clipboard.

fixMsgTableHeader_tip.message: If the header of the table is not visible in viewport, it will be fixed at the top of the page for easier reference.

fixTableHeaderAtTop_tip.message: If the header of the table is not visible in viewport, it will be fixed at the top of the page for easier reference.

floatControlButtonsOnPostingDetailPage.message: Float control buttons on posting detail page

floatControlButtonsOnPostingDetailPage_t.message: Float control buttons (Apply, Shortlist, Not Interested, Print, Back to Search, etc.) at the bottom of posting detail page.

floatRightSidePanels_tip.message: Once the top edge of right side panels becomes invisible on screen, the panels will be fixed to the right.

hideCampusConnectBadge.message: Hide Campus Connect badge on navigation tabs

importFailed.message: Import failed. Incorrect option text format. Please check your input.

importPlaceholder.message: Paste options text here and click 'Import'

keepMeLoggedIn_tip.message: Prevent WaterlooWorks from logging you out by automatically calling the keepMeLoggedInClicked function every 1700 seconds.

keywordsToBeHighlighted_tip.message:
▷ The above keywords will be highlighted on posting details page.

▷ Use the input box to add a keyword and click the remove icon next to a keyword to remove it.

▷ Keywords are case insensitive. Symbols are not recommended.

▷ For performance considerations, please keep the total number of keywords below 10.

largerFontSize_tip.message: Accessibility: Slightly enlarge the font for easier reading

lightThemeDarkTheme_tip.message: Enable this option to use the default light azure theme. Disable this option to use the dark turquoise theme.

needRefreshToApply.message: Refresh for the changes to take effect.

notes_intro.message:
▷ Don't use other WaterlooWorks extensions together with Azure to avoid unexpected behaviors.

▷ WaterlooWorks may change at any time, thus the extension may not always function properly.

▷ If you have any suggestions or questions regarding this extension, please email me at sam.zj.shao@gmail.com or submit your feedback online.

oneClickEmptyShortlist_tip.message: Add an extra button above the shortlist table. Click to empty all the shortlisted jobs. (Due to WaterlooWorks' restrictions, one job is removed every 0.8s instead of remove all at once)

openMessagesInNewTab_tip.message: Open selected messages in new tab instead of current one.

openPostingsInNewTab_tip.message:
Shortcuts instructions:

1. Left click job title: open in new active tab

2. Middle click job title: open in new background tab

3. Hold Ctrl/Cmd and Left click job title: open in current tab

postingModalDisplay_tip.message:
▷ Select the items to be displayed in the modal.

▷ Use the sort arrows on the right to reorder.

▷ Press the button at the end to reset this list to default.

redirectToWelcomePageWhenNotLoggedIn.message: Redirect to welcome page when not logged in

redirectToWelcomePageWhenNotLoggedIn_tip.message: If the loggin session expires or after log out, redirect to the welcome page automatically without clicking any links.

resetConfirmMessage.message: Are you sure to reset to default?

reverseTitleOrder_tip.message: Reverse the order of page title to make is more logical.

showGlassdoorCompanyRanking_tip.message: The extension uses Ajax to request company ranking information from Glassdoor. Since Glassdoor closed the public API sign up, so it's not possible to request directly from their server. As an alternative approach, this extension requests information from the author's server. Company name is the only data being sent. The server will try to search Glassdoor and send data back to the client. If you don't want this function, please turn the switch off.

showGlassdoorQuickSearchLink_tip.message: Add external link to context menu and pop-up job preview to view company rankings and other relative information on Glassdoor.

showMsgCategory_tip.message: Show / hide category and subcategory of messages.

showTitlesInUppercaseLetters_tip.message: Disable this option to display preview titles in original styles

switchBookingOptionsToTop.message: Switch "booking options" box to the top

switchBookingOptionsToTop_tip.message: Switch the position of "terms of consultation" and "booking options" for easier access.

useDefaultStyleAndCombine.message: Azure Default <small>(Combine job title, organization, division)</small>

useKeyboardArrowKeysToSwitchPages_tip.message: Press left / right arrow keys on the keyboard to switch between previous / next job posting preview. Press Alt + underlined letter in button to trigger click event.

useNewAzureHomepage_tip.message: Replace the default dark welccome page with the new designed azure version. Important messages such as scheduled maintenance will also be added to the new page.

welcomeIntro.message:
Thanks for using WaterlooWorks Azure! This is one of the best extensions created for WaterlooWorks. It makes WaterlooWorks a much more user-friendly platform with multiple new themes and a variety of new helpful features.

If you like this extension, please rate and leave a comment in the extension store.

welcomePopupContent.message:
Welcome to WaterlooWorks Azure

Azure is an extension created for enhancing your experience with WaterlooWorks.

Due to the complexity of this extension, it is recommended that you check all the tabs, read each option, and make adjustments according to your needs.

If you have any questions regarding this extension, please feel free to let me know. See "About" section below.
